name: The Hole (Kayky Dias)
description:
Hello guys, welcome to The Hole. An arcade game that challenge all type of players to get the highest score!

The objective is simple, you just need to reach the hole, with your white ball, to be free from the maze that become larger every time that you escape from it.

Obs.: This game was made for the My First Game Jam and by me.

Good luck and have fun!
